dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the impact of emergency response times on mortality rates and healthcare costs, emphasizing the critical nature of reducing response times for emergency vehicles.
dcterms:title: Emergency response time data

dcterms:creator: L. Bieker-Walz
M. Behrisch
M. Junghans
dcterms:description: SUMO is a traffic simulation tool that allows for the modeling of urban mobility and traffic scenarios, providing a platform for testing various traffic management strategies.
dcterms:title: SUMO (Simulation of Urban MObility)

dcterms:creator: L. Bieker-Walz
M. Behrisch
M. Junghans
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes the traffic behavior of emergency vehicles in a microscopic traffic simulation, providing insights into their interactions with other vehicles.
dcterms:title: Traffic behavior of emergency vehicles in a microscopic traffic simulation

dcterms:creator: D. Brady
B. B. Park
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on improving emergency vehicle routing by incorporating additional road features, enhancing the efficiency of emergency response.
dcterms:title: Emergency vehicle routing with additional road features

dcterms:creator: B. Gong
Z. Yang
C. Lin
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a dispatching optimization and routing guidance system for emergency vehicles during disasters, focusing on enhancing response efficiency.
dcterms:title: Dynamic route guidance systems and vehicle evacuation algorithm

dcterms:creator: I. Ismath
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the use of DSRC/WAVE based vehicular communication for emergency vehicle traversal, focusing on communication strategies to enhance response times.
dcterms:title: Emergency Vehicle Traversal using DSRC/WAVE based Vehicular Communication

dcterms:creator: W. Kang
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses traffic signal coordination strategies specifically designed for emergency vehicles, aiming to improve their passage through intersections.
dcterms:title: Traffic signal coordination for emergency vehicles

dcterms:creator: S. Humagain
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a systematic review of various route optimization and preemption methods for emergency vehicles, summarizing existing strategies and their effectiveness.
dcterms:title: A systematic review of route optimisation and pre-emption methods for emergency vehicles

dcterms:creator: H. Mu
Y. Song
L. Liu
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on route-based signal preemption control for emergency vehicles, providing insights into how traffic signals can be adjusted to prioritize emergency response.
dcterms:title: Traffic signal control strategies for emergency vehicles

dcterms:creator: J. Zhao
Y. Guo
X. Duan
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a dynamic path planning approach for emergency vehicles based on travel time prediction, aiming to enhance routing efficiency.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Path Planning of Emergency Vehicles Based on Travel Time Prediction
